tileset = "sandcave";
area = "sandcave4";
areaname = "Sandflow Caves";
ambience = null;
dungeon = "sandcave";
A_sprites = [{name:"Save Crystal",model:"o_Crystal",x:36,y:42,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_healingCrystal"},{name:"Blue Gate",model:"object",x:38,y:36,type:"switch_gate",colour:"sapphire",conv:[["","It\'s a large, ornate golden door. There\'s a large sapphire set in the centre, glowing faintly."]]},{name:"Green Gate",model:"object",x:14,y:34,type:"switch_gate",colour:"emerald",conv:[["","It\'s a large, ornate golden door. There\'s a large emerald set in the centre, glowing faintly."]]},{name:"Green Keystone",model:"object",x:11,y:47,type:"switch_orb",colour:"emerald",base:"gold",conv_action:1},{name:"Cave",model:"area_transition",x:6,y:42,dest:["sandcaveSC",10,22]},{name:"A",model:"area_transition",x:49,y:45,dest:["sandcave3",1,4],ARROW:"E"},{name:"E",model:"area_transition",x:49,y:23,dest:["sandcave5",1,39],ARROW:"E"},{name:"F",model:"area_transition",x:49,y:2,dest:["sandcave5",1,13],ARROW:"E"}];
if(!GameData.plotVars.CH3SQ3[1].Ssossdj)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Reptoid Warrior Ssossdj",model:"reptoid_warrior",x:22,y:21,walkspeed:40,dir:"n",elem:"EARTH",conv:"c_ch3sq3"});
}
areaLoot = [{x:2,y:6,amount:1,item:"Moonstone"},{x:6,y:22,amount:740,type:"gold"},{x:20,y:35,amount:1,item:"Snakestone"},{x:29,y:27,amount:1,item:"Bottle O\' Acid"},{x:43,y:21,amount:1,item:"Dark Essence"}];
